parameters.openAiEndpoint: [if(parameters('createAzureOpenAi'), createObject('value', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, if(not(empty(parameters('openAiResourceGroupName'))), parameters('openAiResourceGroupName'), format('{0}-rg', parameters('name')))), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'openai'), '2022-09-01').outputs.endpoint.value), createObject('value', parameters('openAiEndpoint')))]

metadata.description: Creates or updates an existing Azure Container App.
The environment name for the container apps
The number of CPU cores allocated to a single container instance, e.g., 0.5
The maximum number of replicas to run. Must be at least 1.
The amount of memory allocated to a single container instance, e.g., 1Gi
The minimum number of replicas to run. Must be at least 1.
The name of the container
The name of the container registry
Hostname suffix for container registry. Set when deploying to sovereign clouds
The protocol used by Dapr to connect to the app, e.g., HTTP or gRPC
Enable or disable Dapr for the container app
The Dapr app ID
Specifies if the resource already exists
Specifies if Ingress is enabled for the container app
The type of identity for the resource
The name of the user-assigned identity
The name of the container image
The secrets required for the container
The environment variables for the container
Specifies if the resource ingress is exposed externally
The service binds associated with the container
The target port for the container

parameters.imageName: [if(not(empty(parameters('imageName'))), createObject('value', parameters('imageName')), if(parameters('exists'), createObject('value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.App/containerApps', parameters('name')), '2023-05-02-preview').template.containers[0].image), createObject('value', '')))]

metadata.description: Creates a container app in an Azure Container App environment.
Allowed origins
Name of the environment for container apps
CPU cores allocated to a single container instance, e.g., 0.5
The maximum number of replicas to run. Must be at least 1.
Memory allocated to a single container instance, e.g., 1Gi
The minimum number of replicas to run. Must be at least 1.
The name of the container
The name of the container registry
Hostname suffix for container registry. Set when deploying to sovereign clouds
The protocol used by Dapr to connect to the app, e.g., http or grpc
The Dapr app ID
Enable Dapr
The environment variables for the container
Specifies if the resource ingress is exposed externally
The name of the user-assigned identity
The type of identity for the resource
The name of the container image
Specifies if Ingress is enabled for the container app
The secrets required for the container
The service binds associated with the container
The name of the container apps add-on to use. e.g. redis
The target port for the container

configuration.ingress: [if(parameters('ingressEnabled'), createObject('external', parameters('external'), 'targetPort', parameters('targetPort'), 'transport', 'auto', 'corsPolicy', createObject('allowedOrigins', union(createArray('https://portal.azure.com', 'https://ms.portal.azure.com'), parameters('allowedOrigins')))), null())]
configuration.dapr: [if(parameters('daprEnabled'), createObject('enabled', true(), 'appId', parameters('daprAppId'), 'appProtocol', parameters('daprAppProtocol'), 'appPort', if(parameters('ingressEnabled'), parameters('targetPort'), 0)), createObject('enabled', false()))]

metadata.description: Assigns ACR Pull permissions to access an Azure Container Registry.
Creates a role assignment for a service principal.
Creates a role assignment for a service principal.
